features: BRIGHTEN, BALANCE, AND SOOTHE: Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Niacinamide Brightening Toner made with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant skin! Tone and brighten with this super gentle, alcohol-free toner!

TARGET HYPERPIGMENTATION, DULLNESS, AND ENLARGED PORES: Notice the difference in your skin! This gentle toner targets texture, dullness, uneven skin tone, and discoloration with a formula designed to bring out the best in your skin, leaving you glowing and refreshed.

POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Niacinamide and Arbutin work to brighten dull skin and improve the look of hyperpigmentation, while licorice root extract helps to soothe inflammation, giving your skin an even clear tone.
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense onto a cotton pad and gently sweep over freshly cleansed skin. Can also be dispensed into palms and patted into the skin until fully absorbed.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this toner is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 6.2, is alcohol-free, vegan, and was never tested on animals.
body.description: Niacinamide Brightening Toner by Good Molecules120ml/4ozPromote a bright, even tone and less visible pores with this alcohol-free toner from Good Molecules. Niacinamide Brightening Toner is formulated with a soothing blend of brightening ingredients that work to reduce the appearance of dullness, uneven skin tone, and enlarged pores.See A Difference In Your SkinNiacinamide (vitamin B3) is a vitamin thought to have many benefits for the skin. It works to visibly brighten and improve the appearance of enlarged pores, uneven skin tone, dullness, and blemishes. Our formula also contains Vitamin C to nourish, brighten and protect against environmental damage. This toner also works to correct the look of hyperpigmentation with naturally derived arbutin while licorice root soothes and discourages inflammation. Your skin will be thanking you!Easy Addition To Your Beauty RegimenThis toner can be used day or night and is suitable for all skin types. Simply dispense a small amount onto a cotton pad and gently sweep over freshly cleansed skin. It can also be applied by dispensing into palms and patting into the skin until fully absorbed. Enjoy a balanced tone and bright, refreshed skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seeing a difference
reviews.reviewText: A friend introduced me to this product line. I bought the larger size bottle and have been using it twice a day. I put a small amount in the palm of my hands after washing and drying my face and just pat it all over. And then I let my skin completely dry before adding vitamin C cream followed by my daily lotion ontop of that. My skin just looks and feels brighter and prettier and it’s only been about three weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have suppperr dry skin & big pores. When using this product it doesn’t burn or cause irritation on my skin. It’s a bit sticky after applying but for someone who’s got very dry skin, it goes away after an hour. It also got a 100/100 on Yuka (: so the product will not harm you or expose you to any harsh chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even my skin tone
reviews.reviewText: What I like about this toner is first of all it’s fragrances free. My skin is sensitive and I can’t use scented products on my face so with a skincare product that is fragrance free is a plus for me. I use this toner with the discoloration correcting serum. I’ve been using it about 2 months now and I’ve seen a bit of improvement in my skin tone. My bottle of the serum is now finish and I’ll be purchasing more. It let my skin glows and even my skin tone that’s what works for me. A little also goes a long way. It’s not harsh on the face or anything it just feels like water on your skin and I love that. Highly recommend, even if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a winner
reviews.reviewText: I am turning 60 in September. I have an arsenal of beauty products. I have enlarged pores, which I find very unattractive. I have tried every possible product imaginable. I was so happy to find an affordable option. I have fair skin and I am self-conscious about my skin. I am very pleased with this product's ability to make my skin appear smoother. The product texture is revitalizing. Give it a try it is affordable and I see results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this toner with a mixture of products. I was using witch hazel for my toner but I feel like this helps with my dark spots and my skin. I’m getting compliments on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ayuda a aclarar el rostro
reviews.reviewText: Soy una mujer negra, no tengo muchas imperfecciones pero este producto me ha ayudado a aclarar mi rostro en un mes, mi piel parece otra... lo utilizo todos los días en las noches, antes le temía a la niacinamida pero ya no. Hoy te puedo decir que no te arrepentirás de comprarlo si eres constante con tu skin care diario.. Es muy muy muy bueno..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm very particular about my products. I did a lot of research before I purchased this product. This is my third time ordering it. I order three bottles each time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this product without much expectation. Let me tell you money well spent and definitely seen results within first week of use.
